details: SLURM is a workload manager used to submit and manage jobs, including the running of the python script.
The script requests a single node with 8 CPUs and 32GB of memory from the "gpu-a40" partition within the "ark" account.
The script uses one GPU, specifically an A40.
A conda environment named "ckl" is activated using source ~/.bashrc and conda activate ckl.
The script uses a Python 3.8 environment located in /mmfs1/gscratch/ark/tjung2/miniconda3/envs/ckl/lib/python3.8/site-packages.
The script runs a Python script called run.py with the configuration file configs/templama/evaluation/t5_kadapters_2011.json.
